alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 6:23PM EST until further notice by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Ottawa. * WHEN...Until 615 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Grand River and other low-lying and flood-prone locations in an around Robinson Township is imminent or occurring. Depending on ice behavior, any release of the ice jam could result in sudden rises of water, leading to a rapid flooding situation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 620 PM EST, Automated river gauges and county official observers indicated an ice jam. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly near the warned area. Breakup is occuring but there are indications that ice is jamming up near the 231 bridge. This will result in flooding of the Robinson Township area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Central Ottawa County including the Robinson Township area - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
